column4:
おいガキども！！！
いつぞやの罰を覚えているな！
column5:
HEY, BRATS!!!
Don't think I've forgotten about your punishment for back then!
column11:
Oi, brats!!!
Don't think I've forgotten about your punishment from a while back!

column4:
マリオネーションギアを使った
勝手な出撃。
column5: I remember that time you decided you'd just waltz the Marionation Gear off into combat on your own!
column11: That time you took the Marionation Gear on a sortie without permission.

column4: 無断でのゴッドフリード改造。

その罰として、
今日は大掃除をしてもらう。
column5: As punishment, I'll have you on cleaning duty today.
column11: As penance, today I'll have you on cleaning duty.

column4:
いいか！
日が暮れるまでに
格納庫全部をピカピカにしろ。
column5:
LISTEN UP!
By the end of the day, I want this hangar polished until it's gleaming.
column11:
Listen up!
By the end of the day, I want this hangar polished until it's gleaming.

column4:
チリ一つでも残ってやがったら、
ただじゃおかねぇ！
column5: And if I see so much as a smirk on your faces, I'll make you wipe THOSE clean off too!
column11: And if I see as much as a smile on your faces, I'll make you wipe those clean off too!

column4: 主人公＿ちょっとした驚き
アンマリー＿身がまえて話す
こりゃ、やるしかないな……。
column5: Well, guess we don't have any other choice...
column11: Well, we don't have any other choice...

column4:
普通にやってたら、
とても終わんねぇよ。
column5: If we do it like normal, this is never gonna end.
column11: If we do it like normal, it's never gonna end.

column4:
気合いれて
やんないとダメだな。
column5: We've gotta get fired up, or else it's hopeless.
column11: We've got to get fired up, else it's hopeless.

column4: アンマリー＿身がまえて話す

ま、がんばんなさい、
あんたたち。
column11: Well, give it your all, guys.

column4:
２人でやれば
なんとかなるでしょ。
column5: The two of you ought to be able to handle this.
column11: The two of you ought to be able to handle this.

column4:
お前は
やんないのかよ！？

掃除なんて
やったことないもの。
column11: I've never had to clean up before.

column4:
やったことないって……。
一度もないのかよ。
column5:
You've never done it...?
Not even once?
column11:
You've never done it before...
Not even once?

column4:
今までどうやって
生きてきたんだ。
column5: How have you even managed to survive?
column11: How have you even managed to survive?

column4:
私は、ダンクール家の人間
だから。

全部、メイドが
やってくれたし。

確か、代々
人形使いを輩出してる
名門だったような……。
column5: If I remember right...they're a prestigious family who've turned out Puppeteers for generations...
column11: If I remember correctly, they're a prestigous family who have been turning out pupetters for generations...

column4: アンマリー＿親しい人と話す

column5: So then, I leave the cleaning to you.
column11: So, I'll leave the cleaning to you.

column4:
いっちまった……。
マジかよ。
column5:
She's already gone...
I don't believe this.
